name: Garbage Collection
description:
Game Jam Submission - Mini Jam 123 : Web (2 Days)

Was not thoroughly tested (due to the time constraint) - Good Luck...

Original Submission:

Found a lot of bugs with the original version of the game a day after submissions where due - Decided to update the game with V.01 -

Update V.01:

Fixes and Changes:

  • Economy and Score Stats Reset on New Game (No Longer Need to Close Game)
  • Lose / Win Condition Fixed
  • Broken Node Placement and Node Strands after UI Interaction Fixed
  • Selecting On UI While Placing No Longer Places Before Changing Selection
  • Node Placement Over Enemy Units Now Work
  • Range of Turrets Now Shown
  • Node Overlap Issues Fixed
  • Reduced Click Actions (Better Controls)

More fixes on the way! (V.02)

-

All music is covered under an Artlist Subscription - Credit:

Downtown Binary - End Game

Shinto - Neon Night

sero - Monos

-

All Assets where Created by Me Except:

Music - Fonts

-

Thanks for checking it out!

- Brento
